Title: IRobot.NET - C# project for controlling an IRobot Create (UI & Reusable library)
Description: This is a C# IRobot Create library w/ an accompanied Silverlight client that allows for remote interaction.    To make use of this entire project, mounting a .net capable computer on the IRobot Create is suggested.
HomeWiki:
Summary

This is a C# IRobot Create library w/ an accompanied Silverlight client that allows for remote interaction. To make use of this entire project, mounting a .net capable computer on the IRobot Create is suggested.

What is the IRobot Create?

More information about the "IRobot Create" can be found at http://store.irobot.com/shop/index.jsp?categoryId=3311368

Other Notes

  • This code is in it's infancy, so feel free to contribute to speed things up.
  • This project was created by Josh Schwartzberg http://weblogs.asp.net/dotjosh
